verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Should not the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H6030>answered<s%>? And should a <S%H376>man<s%> full of <S%H8193>talk<s%> be <S%H6663>justified<s%>?
Should thy <S%H907>boastings<s%> <S%H2790>make<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> hold their <S%H2790>peace<s%>? And when thou <S%H3932>mockest<s%>, shall no man make thee <S%H3637>ashamed<s%>?
For thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, My <S%H3948>doctrine<s%> is <S%H2134>pure<s%>, And I am <S%H1249>clean<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> oh <S%H5414>that<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H1696>speak<s%>, And <S%H6605>open<s%> his lips against <S%H8193>thee<s%>,

And that he would <S%H5046>show<s%> thee the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>! For he is <S%H3718>manifold<s%> in <S%H8454>understanding<s%>. <S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore that <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H5382>exacteth<s%> of thee less than thine iniquity <S%H5771>deserveth<s%>.
Canst thou by <S%H2714>searching<s%> find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H433>God<s%>? Canst thou <S%H4672>find<s%> out the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> unto <S%H8503>perfection<s%>?
It is <S%H1363>high<s%> as <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; what canst thou <S%H6466>do<s%>? <S%H6013>Deeper<s%> than <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>; What canst thou <S%H3045>know<s%>?
The <S%H4055>measure<s%> thereof is <S%H752>longer<s%> than the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And <S%H7342>broader<s%> than the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
If he pass <S%H2498>through<s%>, and shut <S%H5462>up<s%>, And <S%H6950>call<s%> unto <S%H7725>judgment<s%>, then who can hinder him?
For he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%>: He <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> <S%H995>also<s%>, even though he consider it not.
But <S%H5014>vain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is void of <S%H3823>understanding<s%>, <S%H120>Yea<s%>, man is <S%H3205>born<s%> as a wild <S%H6501>ass<s%>'s <S%H5895>colt<s%>.
If thou <S%H3559>set<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6566>aright<s%>, And stretch out thy hands toward <S%H3709>him<s%>;
If <S%H205>iniquity<s%> be in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, put it far <S%H7368>away<s%>, And let not <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H168>tents<s%>.
Surely then shalt thou lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> without <S%H3971>spot<s%>; <S%H3332>Yea<s%>, thou shalt be stedfast, and shalt not <S%H3372>fear<s%>:
For thou shalt <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H5999>misery<s%>; Thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> it as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are passed <S%H5674>away<s%>,
And thy <S%H2465>life<s%> shall be <S%H6965>clearer<s%> than the <S%H6672>noonday<s%>; Though there be <S%H5774>darkness<s%>, it shall be as the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
And thou shalt be <S%H982>secure<s%>, because there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%>; <S%H2658>Yea<s%>, thou shalt search about <S%H7901>thee<s%>, and shalt take thy rest in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
Also thou shalt lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, and none shall make thee <S%H2729>afraid<s%>; <S%H7227>Yea<s%>, many shall make <S%H2470>suit<s%> unto <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

But the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>, And they shall have no way to <S%H6>flee<s%>; And their <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall be the giving <S%H4646>up<s%> of the <S%H5315>ghost<s%>.
